definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Objective To study the extxtraction process of polysaccharide from Damnanthus indicus Gaertn.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选绣花针中多糖的提取工艺。

sentences.english: Fine linen with embroidered work from Egypt was that which thou spreadest forth to be thy sail;
sentences.chinese: 你的篷帆是用埃及绣花细麻布作的，可以作你的大旗。

sentences.english: Speak, ye that ride on white asses, ye that sit in judgment, and walk by the way.
sentences.chinese: 骑白驴的，坐绣花毯子的，行路的，你们都当传扬。

sentences.english: Over-embroidered plaids are pleated and cut cross-grain and straight-grain mixed in garments.
sentences.chinese: 绣花格子在服装中交叉或直布纹混合。

sentences.english: Vendors here sell handmade rugs, clothing and glittering embroidered slippers.
sentences.chinese: 商贩们在售卖陶罐，服装和亮光闪闪的绣花拖鞋。

sentences.english: This embroidery weaving system is aimed at producing fabrics for e. g. curtains and shirting.
sentences.chinese: 此台绣花织布机主要用于织造窗帘布和衬衫面料等。

sentences.english: You shouldn't belittle this tiny embroidered needle. It can play a big role sometime.
sentences.chinese: 小看这小小的绣花针，可以绣出大文章。

sentences.english: Comerio - The Manufacturer of Schiffli Embroidery Machine.
sentences.chinese: 一家飞梭绣花机生产厂家。

sentences.english: She is extremely beautiful, but she hates others to look on her as an embroidered pillow.
sentences.chinese: 她漂亮极了，但她从不喜欢别人把她看成是绣花枕头。

sentences.english: Between the two workspaces stood a little house with hydrangeas in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 两个作坊间的院子里有间小屋，上面还有个绣花球。

sentences.english: AWS embroidery and print motif on the chest.
sentences.chinese: 胸部的绣花和印图很好的体现了优点。

sentences.english: Embroidery machine keyboard keys used for positioning of the pantograph or frame.
sentences.chinese: 绣花机键盘按键，用来定位绣框或者缩放仪。

sentences.english: The every sewing embroiders to spend a type of works to all do.
sentences.chinese: 凡是缝纫绣花一类的工作都做。

sentences.english: Is embroidery thread inventoried and issued by order?
sentences.chinese: 绣花线是按定单存放的吗？

sentences.english: Top trimmed with embroidery and print motifs on front.
sentences.chinese: 正面带有绣花设计和魅力印图。
